name: Code Execution Shared Settings
description: Shared configuration for code execution functionality, automatically available when any code execution engine is configured

openwebui_variables.name: CODE_INTERPRETER_BLACKLISTED_MODULES
openwebui_variables.description: Comma-separated list of Python modules that are blacklisted and cannot be imported or used within the code interpreter. Enhances security by preventing access to potentially sensitive or system-level functionalities.
